sentences.sContent: The business of life is to enjoy oneself.
sentences.sContent_eng: The business of life is to enjoy oneself.
sentences.sCn: 生活的内容就是快快乐乐地过日子。

sentences.sContent: I want you be pround of me. I hope you enjoy oneself.
sentences.sContent_eng: I want you be pround of me. I hope you enjoy oneself.
sentences.sCn: 我想让您因我而自豪。我希望你能过得快乐！
